lead_paragraph: “Inside the NFL,” which HBO Sports canceled in February after a 31-year run, was picked up by Showtime. It will be produced by CBS Sports, a corporate sister of Showtime, and NFL Films, and be shown Wednesday nights. HBO dropped the program, saying that it had lost its uniqueness amid the proliferation of N.F.L.-oriented studio programs on television.
